JobFullDesc: About the RoleWe are looking for an individual who has strong operational, processes implementation and analytical skills. The Operations Coordinator will work in collaboration with the Operations and Cross-Functional (Legal, Policy, Marketing, Comms, Support) Teams to execute projects. This person will work to boost driver and rider engagement and drive growth and profitability via creative solutions. This is a key position that can make a big impact on business and change the way people move in PBEC. We are currently operating in over 12 cities, and we have a lot of exciting projects going on!What You'll Do:Work closely with PBEC’s operations team to grow our business and overcome challengesProblem Solving. Scope sophisticated problems and derive integral solutions based on robust analysisDevelop & Optimize Processes. Take big picture ideas and break them into impactful stepsStrong executional and implementation skills. Make projects and plans a reality.Collaboration. Build and develop positive relationships with cross-functional teamsGet ahead: you lead your projects completely and are a steadfast advocate for creating business value and have a positive attitude and ability to operate in a very fast paced environmentWhat You'll Need:1+ years of quantitative experience with a consistent record of solving analytical problemsIdeal background experience in: consulting, investment banking, technology, any operations-intense fast-paced environment, ambitious setting, or related fieldEasily adapt to a constantly-changing work environmentData-driven decision mentality through strong analytical thinkingStrong implementation skills and process design orientationCreative solutions mindset with an affinity to constantly A/B test ideasProficiency in EnglishSQL preferred, Python or R are a plusUber is proud to be an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.
